description: Comprehensive maintenance tips for accessibility ramps, home modifications, and safety features in Buffalo, Kenmore, Tonawanda, North Tonawanda, and Cheektowaga.

mainEntity.name: How often should I inspect my ramp?

acceptedAnswer.text: Monthly inspections are recommended, with additional checks after extreme weather.

mainEntity.name: Can I maintain a ramp myself?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, basic cleaning and tightening fasteners are fine, but for major repairs, consult professionals.

mainEntity.name: What’s the lifespan of a well-maintained ramp?

acceptedAnswer.text: Wood: 10–15 years, Aluminum: 20+ years, Concrete: 30+ years. Proper maintenance can extend life significantly.
